mapper.insert: insert into answer(qn_id, qn_name, q_id, user_id, user_name, type,a_id) values (#{qnId}, #{qnName}, #{qId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{type},#{aId})
insert into answer_matrix(id, choice, columns) values (#{id}, #{choice}, #{columns})
insert into answer_scale(id, choice, score) values (#{id}, #{choice}, #{score})
mapper.select: select id, qn_id as qnId, q_id as qId, user_id as userId, create_time as createTime, type, qn_name as qnName, user_name as userName from answer where qn_id = #{qnId} and user_name = #{userName} order by q_id

select case when #{type} = 1 and #{type} = 2 then (select * from answer_choice where id = #{id}) when #{type} = 3 then (select * from answer_blank where id = #{id}) when #{type} = 4 then (select * from answer_matrix where id = #{id}) when #{type} = 5 then (select * from answer_scale where id = #{id}) end;

SELECT id, qn_id as qnId, q_id as qId, user_id as userId, create_time as createTime, type, qn_name as qnName, user_name as userName FROM answer WHERE (qn_id, user_id,create_time) IN ( SELECT qn_id, user_id, create_time FROM answer GROUP BY qn_id );
select max(id) from answer_id where user_id =#{userId}
